description:
As a shopper
  I can add/remove/update subscription product qantity on shop
name: Check Product add/remove/update subscription product qantity on product-detail-page/cart-page/cart-in-sidebar/express-checkout-page/quick-add-to-cart

steps.name: I am on Admin Login Page
I fill correct account email to email field
I fill correct account password to password field
I click on login button
I should see successful login
I check intercom message notification frame and click clear intercom message button
I check intercom message notification frame and click intercom message close button
I check new feature alert notification frame and click new feature alert close button
I check and click no thanks button
I am on Promotion Index Page
I input '18th Free Gift Promotion' to search field
1st row of promotion list should contain '18th Free Gift Promotion'

embeddings.data: {"elementText":"18th Free Gift Promotion Selected Products2020/06/10 02:00 AM toNever expiresAll Customers Auto Apply 0 / Unlimited Usage Record Edit","expectText":"18th Free Gift Promotion"}

steps.name: I click on row of select checkbox list
I select publish of bulk actions dropdown
I am on Product Index Page
I input '17th Product for Checkout' to search field
1st row of product name should contain '17th Product for Checkout'

embeddings.data: {"elementText":"17th Product for Checkout","expectText":"17th Product for Checkout"}

steps.name: I click on 1st row of edit button
I should be redirected to Product Edit Page
I click on quantity and pricing tab
I check and click product subscription disabled
I should see product subscription enabled
I click on update button
I am on Promotion Setting Page
I should see show promotion campaign toggle
I check and click show promotion campaign toggle off
show promotion campaign toggle should be checked
I click on update button
I should see alert
I am on Design Page
I click on advanced setting tab
I click on preference checkbox included "Instant Add to Cart"

embeddings.data: {"retryCount":1,"elementTexts":["Collapse menu items in mobile by default","Hide categories on mobile menu","Collapse categories by default","Crop product images to fill the product box","Show variation image selector under the product image","Hide the language selector on storefront","Allow Customers to select the displayed currency","Enable \"sort by product sales volume\" on storefront","Enable \"Back to top\" button to the shop","Enable “Instant Add to Cart” to the shop","Activate the \"Add to Wishlist Button\" feature to the store","Activate the \"Buy Now Button\" feature to the store","Hide the social network sharing button on product page"],"text":"Instant Add to Cart"}
